solution_line_template: Mary spent {initial_money}/{video_game_divisor}= <<{initial_money}/{video_game_divisor}={video_game_cost}>>{video_game_cost} dollars on a new video game.
So, after the video game purchase, Mary was left with {initial_money} - {video_game_cost} = <<{initial_money}-{video_game_cost}={money_after_video_game}>>{money_after_video_game} dollars.
Mary then bought swimming goggles for {money_after_video_game}/{goggles_divisor} = <<{money_after_video_game}/{goggles_divisor}={goggles_cost}>>{goggles_cost} dollars
